channel.title: Read Please
channel.description:
Okay, I've been running my server for about 2-3 weeks, and its uptime is 24-7 but yet, only like 2 people play it daily, what do you guys reccomend i do to get more players? i have it posted on all the best server status lists. But Nobody seems to care for my server, Any Reccomendations on how to get/keep players?
Like what would you guys like if you just logged onto a server? what would you want? Idk, Please Throw Me some Tips, Thanks!
``Greg``

item.title: Read Please
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

Make a youtube video of all the features on your server, it attracts a ton of new players ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Read Please
item.dc:creator: @str2own99 str2own99
item.description:
@str2own99 wrote:

make sure u add pictures when ur posting ur server and make a forum

Read full topic
